summary: A weakling sheriff is unable to prevent a lynching. Can he redeem himself by preventing a second one?
cast: Rod Steiger|William Shatner|Fay Spain|James Gregory|Mario Alcalde|Martin Garralaga|Eugene Iglesias|Malcolm Atterbury|Paul Lambert|Sandy Kenyon|Clegg Hoyt|Eddie Ryder|Helen Kleeb|Miriam Colon|Robert Ryan|Fred Aldrich|Al Bain|Oscar Blank|Noble 'Kid' Chissell|Elias Gamboa|George Huggins|Dick Johnstone|Jack Kenny|David O. McCall|Mathew McCue|Charles Morton|Daniel Nunez|Joe Phillips|Mabel Smaney|Bert Spencer|Ray Spiker|Roque Ybarra
title: A Town Has Turned to Dust
